import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../css/main-page.css"; import exit from "../images/exit.svg"; import vector from "../images/vector.svg" import SearchForm from "../components/SearchForm"; import Location from "../components/Location_Input"; import Hotel_Item from "../components/Favourite_item"; import Unfavourite_item from "../components/Unfavourite_item"; const Main = () => { const months = ["января", "февраля", "марта", "апреля", "мая", "июля", "июня", "августа", "сентября", "октября", "ноября", "декабря"] const [choosedLocation, setChoosedLocation] = useState("Выбранный город") const [choosedDate, setChoosedDate] = useState("Дата заселения") const locationSubmit = (location, date) => { setChoosedLocation(location) setChoosedDate(date.slice(2)) } return (
